creator: macobt
title: How to make led lamp to save dollars
description: This project describes how to build a homemade LED lamp using 8 one-watt LEDs to replace a 60-watt incandescent bulb, saving energy and money.
steps: Connect the 8 LEDs in a serial array, with one array containing 5 LEDs and the other containing 3 LEDs.
Replace an old incandescent bulb with the homemade LED lamp.
